pr_title: Change refit model weight calculation to work with BA

timeline.message: Change refit model weight calculation to work with BA

timeline.author: Windchild292

replies.bodyText: Also, should this be based on the ADVANCED_TACOPS_BA_WEIGHT option?
replies.author: Windchild292

replies.bodyText: No, this should be TWweight to work as intended when compared to getTroopers.  I'm pretty sure MechSummary was written before BA/Infantry was fully implemented, as it doesn't have any functionality for tracking the number of troopers.  Infantry/BA refits bear a more comprehensive look at some point, but that's not a rabbithole I want to go down at present.
replies.author: mkerensky

timeline.bodyText: Can we swap this to use UnitType.getTypeName(e.getUnitType()), as the current method is deprecated.
timeline.author: Windchild292
